meanings.sent1: The branchline connected the small towns to the main city.
meanings.sent2: The train chugged along the branchline through the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The branchline decided to take a detour through the forest for an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts followed the branchline of memories, each leading to a different destination.
meanings.sent5: The branchline snaked through the landscape like a ribbon of steel.

meanings.definition: A subsidiary part or division of a larger organization or system
meanings.sent1: The branchline of the company focused on marketing strategies.
meanings.sent2: The IT branchline of the corporation handled all technical issues.
meanings.sent3: The branchline of the team was known for their quirky sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity followed a different branchline than her logical thinking.
meanings.sent5: The branchline of customer service ensured all complaints were resolved promptly.
